propDescriptions.action: A ref for imperative actions. It currently only supports focusVisible() action.
propDescriptions.component: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
propDescriptions.onChange: Callback invoked when new value is being set.
propDescriptions.slotProps: The props used for each slot inside the Tab.
propDescriptions.slots: The components used for each slot inside the Tab. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component. See Slots API below for more details.
propDescriptions.value: You can provide your own value. Otherwise, it falls back to the child position index.

root.description: Class name applied to the root element.

slotDescriptions.root: The component that renders the root.
